title: Different behavior on cpu and gpu when size_0_tensor.mean().backward()
body_html:
Issue description

As described in the title.

Code example

>>> import torch
>>> x = torch.tensor([])
>>> x.requires_grad = True
>>> x.mean().backward() # no error triggered
>>> x = x.cuda()
>>> x.mean().backward()
